titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to eliminate the loan origination fee for oilseeds, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S732)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices

bill.summary: 1/26/1993--Introduced. Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to eliminate the oilseed loan origination fee.
